special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense.
descriptions: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:
* The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (adept's choice).
* The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
* The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end ot'the adept's next turn.

actions.name: Dart.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Deflect Missile.
descriptions: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10+3. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.
